howItWorks.title: How AdminZen manages your taxes
howItWorks.subtitle: 3 steps. Zero effort on your part.

step1.title: Connect your emails (2 clicks)
step1.description: AI automatically scans your emails to find all your tax documents (payslips, 3a certificates, deductible invoices). End-to-end encryption, data hosted in Switzerland.

step2.title: AI analyzes and optimizes
step2.description: Automatic identification of all deductions according to your canton. Optimized calculation of your tax. Detection of errors and savings opportunities.

step3.title: Validate in 1 click
step3.description: Your tax declaration is ready. Review, validate, send. Or let AI manage everything automatically. Reminders before each deadline.

security.question: Are my tax data secure?
security.answer: Yes. End-to-end encryption (AES-256), data hosted in Switzerland (Zurich), 100% GDPR compliant. Access only to emails containing tax documents, never to your personal emails.

savings.question: How to save CHF 1,200/year on my taxes?
savings.answer: AI identifies all possible deductions (3rd pillar, professional expenses, childcare costs, etc.) according to your canton. Calculation optimization to minimize your tax burden. Average observed: CHF 500-1,200/year savings.

difference.question: Difference with an accountant or TaxMe?
difference.answer: Accountant = expensive and slow. TaxMe = you fill everything manually. AdminZen = automatic: documents gathered, deductions identified, tax declaration prepared. From 5 hours of work to 1 click.

complexity.question: I'm bad at taxes, is this for me?
complexity.answer: EXACTLY for you! Designed for those who hate taxes. If "3a deduction", "professional expenses" or "November 30 deadline" give you cold sweats, we're made for each other.

cantons.question: Does it work in all cantons?
cantons.answer: Yes! AdminZen works in all 26 Swiss cantons. AI knows the tax specifics of each canton (rates, deductions, forms) and automatically adapts to your situation.

afterWaitlist.question: What happens after the waitlist?
afterWaitlist.answer: We launch the beta version in March 2026 with the first 500 registrations. You'll receive an email with your access, personalized onboarding (15 min), and your reduced price of CHF 5/month will be guaranteed FOR LIFE.
